# Government Tender for LED Lamps Reference: cb-5140-16309086

## bidder showcases information
Title in English:     **cb-5140-16309086 - LED Lamps - Competitive - Open Bidding**
Title in French:     **cb-5140-16309086 - LAMPES LED - Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner**

### Tender Details

| Tender Details         |            |
|------------------------|------------|
| CB Reference           | cb-5140-16309086         |
| Solicitation Number    | W8482-230637/B           |
| Publication Date        | 2023-05-02              |
| Closing Date            | 2023-06-09T14:00:00          |
| Modification Date       | 2023-06-09                     |
| Tender Status           | Expiré                            |

### Contract Details

| Contract Details       |     |
|------------------------|     |
| Trend Category          | GD                                 |
| Trade Agreement         |ultiple Trade Agreements            |
| Procurement Method      | Competitive - Open Bidding           |
| Contracts Criterion     | Lowest Price                          |

### Description

The Government of Canada is issuing a Request for Bids (RFB) for the procurement of LED lamps to the Contracting Authority.

The Contracting Authority is seeking quotations for LED lamps including:

- Item 1: Floodlight Electric (40 Units)
- Item 2: Floodlight Electric (25 Units)
- Item 3: Light Emitting Diode (20 Units)
- Item 4: Light Emitting Diode (12 Units)
- Item 5: Lamp, Light Emitting Diode (40 Units)
- Item 6: Lamp, Light Emitting Diode (25 Units)

The bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.

Offerors must submit their prices and direct i inancements address to **a particular business email address**:

* The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

### Requirement

* Include the brand name: GLAMEXicanada
* Model and/or Part Number: NCAGE: 0Z179

### General Inquiry

Contact Person: Christopher Cauchi

Email: christopher.cauchi@forces.gc.ca

Phone: 555-555-5555
